A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie\, while having some of the best Star Wars scenes ever\, fails as a whole. There are some plot points that are unnecessary and some that also feel like a slap in the face to the potential that this trilogy arc could have been. I am very disappointed in the direction Rian Johnson chose to go\, and vigorously hope that this movie is just a set up for a greater reveal in episode 9. I hope in a few years we can look back at this movie and say\, \"that was a great set up\". But until then\, this movie is not great.
